snippet: A federal court in Atlanta said it would wait until the Supreme Court decided the constitutionality of Arizona’s immigration law before ruling on similar laws in Georgia and Alabama.
abstract: Federal court in Atlanta announces that it will wait until the United States Supreme Court decides the constitutionality of Arizona’s strict immigration law before ruling on similar laws in Georgia and Alabama.
lead_paragraph: A federal court in Atlanta said it would wait until the Supreme Court decided the constitutionality of Arizona’s immigration law before ruling on similar laws in Georgia and Alabama.

headline.main: Georgia: Court Delays Ruling on Immigration Laws
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Court Delays Ruling On Immigration Laws
